Stixbox Function

NAME

    beta - Beta function

CALLING SEQUENCE

y = beta(z,w)
y = beta(x,a,b)

PARAMETERS

    • x,a,b : The elements of x must be in the interval [0,1], a and b must be scalars.

DESCRIPTION

    y = beta(z,w) : the beta function 

        beta(z,w)= Integral from 0 to 1 of t.^(z-1) .* (1-t).^(w-1) dt.

    y = beta(x,a,b) : the incomplete beta function 

        beta(x,a,b)= (1/beta(a,b))* Int from 0 to x of t.^(z-1) .* (1-t).^(w-1) dt.

    beta(x,a,b) is also pbeta(x,a,b) .

SEE ALSO

    betainc pbeta
